snippet: The $1.9 billion deal to acquire the Tyco Fire and Security Services Korea Company and its subsidiaries, including ADT Korea, is the largest private equity buyout deal in South Korea since 2008, the Carlyle Group said.
abstract: The $1.9 billion deal to acquire the Tyco Fire and Security Services Korea Company and its subsidiaries, including ADT Korea, is the largest private equity buyout deal in South Korea since 2008, the Carlyle Group said.

headline.main: Carlyle Agrees to Buy Tyco's South Korean Security Business
